PHRASE.LANG: Having defeated Borf, you decided to take have an exact replica of the "Infanto Ray" made exclusively for you. Show off this full size device in your space. [#Legal]
Après avoir battu Borf, vous avez décidé de prendre une réplique exacte du " Infanto Ray", conçu spécialement pour vous. Exposez-le en taille réelle chez vous. [#Legal]
Nachdem Du Borf besiegt hast, hast Du Dir diese Replik des Verjüngungs-Lasers anfertigen lassen. Stelle diesen in Deinem Bereich aus. [#Legal]
Dopo aver sconfitto Borf, decidi di avere una replica fedele del "Raggio Bambino" realizzata esclusivamente per te. Metti in mostra questo dispositivo a grandezza reale nel tuo ambiente. [#Legal]
Después de derrotar a Borf, decídete por tener una réplica exacta del "Rayo Infantilizante" hecho exclusivamente para ti. Luce este dispositivo de tamaño grande en tu espacio. [#Legal]
Having defeated Borf, you decided to take have an exact replica of the "Infanto Ray" made exclusively for you. Show off this full size device in your space. [#Legal]
